On 11/05 wtp  we have this ear import code.
EARComponentImportDataModelProvider earDataModelProvider  = 
		new EARComponentImportDataModelProvider();
	IDataModelOperation op = null;
	IDataModel earDataModel = null;
	
	try{
		
		
		earDataModel = DataModelFactory.createDataModel
(earDataModelProvider);
		
		//EnterpriseApplicationImportDataModelProvider.
		earDataModel.setProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.FILE_NAME, opt.getInputModuleName());
		earDataModel.setProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.PROJECT_NAME, projectName);
		earDataModel.setBooleanProperty
(IJ2EEComponentCreationDataModelProperties.CREATE_DEFAULT_FILES, false);
		
		//if (!fCalledByWebSphereBuildTask)
		//	earDataModel.setProperty
(IJ2EEComponentCreationDataModelProperties.RUNTIME_TARGET_ID, runtimeTargetId);
		//earDataModel.setBooleanProperty
(IJ2EEComponentCreationDataModelProperties.SYNC_SERVER_TARGETS_WITH_EAR, true);
		
		earDataModel.setProperty
(EARComponentImportDataModelProvider.SAVE_FILTER, new FileExtensionsFilterImpl
(new String[] {"java", "class"}, false));
		
		List moduleList = (List)earDataModel.getProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.SELECTED_MODELS_LIST);
		List clientList = (List)earDataModel.getProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.EJB_CLIENT_LIST);
		
		List modulesNeeded = new ArrayList();
		for (int i=0; i < moduleList.size(); i++){
			IDataModel aModel = (IDataModel)moduleList.get(i);
			Object file = aModel.getProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.FILE);
			
			if (file instanceof ModuleFile){
				ModuleFile moduleFile =  (ModuleFile)file;
				if (moduleFile.isEJBJarFile()){
					modulesNeeded.add(aModel);
					
				}
			}
		}
		modulesNeeded.addAll(clientList);
		earDataModel.setProperty
(IEARComponentImportDataModelProperties.SELECTED_MODELS_LIST, modulesNeeded);
		op = earDataModel.getDefaultOperation();
		
		op.execute(progressMonitor, null);
	}
